activities: APCO Worldwide Inc. is a global consulting company that uses personal data to manage the operations of the business and to administer various benefits programs, such as stock option plans.  Common pieces of personal information that are transferred from the EU to the U.S. to manage business operations include: date of hire, date of termination, salary (for business planning purposes), and employees’ personal address (for mailing program information).  The company also transfers such personal data as photographs and biographies/resumes of employees from the EU to the U.S to market the business of the company.  Occasionally, employee contracts will be transferred from the EU to the U.S. but only on a need to know basis and for the management of the business.
eucountries: Belgium, France, Germany, Italy, Netherlands, United Kingdom
privacyprograms: At this time, APCO Worldwide Inc. is not a member of any privacy programs for safe harbor purposes.
